ovdesc.p: OC.EXCHANGE.FACILITY is a parameter level table that contains information about the Exchange facility or trading platform where OTC derivatives are traded.

desc.p: This field describes XXXX for OTC trades and MIC for ETD
and the value of this field will be reported as EXEC.VENUE in OTD.
8 type MNE ( Upper case alpha or numeric, first character alpha, or ".") characters.
Denotes the name of the Exchange facility or Trading platform where OTC derivatives are traded.
Denotes the legal entity identifier of the exchange facility platform.

denotes how the deals done on a Swap Exchange Facility (SEF), or Trading Platform are read into T24. If interface is Auto then there is a straight through interface available between SEF and T24 i.e. there is no manual capture of trade required in T24, if ‘Manual’ then Bank user has to manually capture the trade details in T24.
Valid Values are Auto and Manual.
